description: Want to ace your Arizona real estate exam?  Look not further!  This app from Upward Mobility for Palm webOS contains 646 questions covering essential vocabulary, general and state exam specific knowledge.  Each question is paired with a concise but detailed explanation to ensure comprehension.  || All of our app content is created exclusively for Upward Mobility by expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and all of our materials undergo a thorough review process. || This app contains: 201 questions on general real estate concepts and national law, 212 questions specific to content on the Arizona state real estate exam, and 233 questions of key Real Estate vocabulary.  Topics include:  Legal Aspects, Encumbrances, Real Estate Law, Financing Escrow, Contracts, Taxation, Subdivision, Business Opportunities, Land Descriptions, Appraisal and Vocabulary. ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
